trim.if: AND t.real_name like "%"#{keyWord}"%" OR t.id_no like "%"#{keyWord}"%"

mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.user_id ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no
,t.bankcard_code ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_code ,t.company_code ,t.biz_price ,t.sf_rate
,t.sf_amount ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount ,t.periods ,t.rest_periods
,t.bank_rate ,t.loan_start_datetime ,t.loan_end_datetime ,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.fx_deposit
,t.first_repay_datetime ,t.first_repay_amount ,t.bill_datetime ,t.month_datetime ,t.month_amount
,t.ly_deposit ,t.cut_ly_deposit ,t.cur_node_code ,t.rest_amount ,t.rest_total_cost
,t.overdue_total_deposit ,t.overdue_total_deposit_income ,t.total_in_deposit ,t.rest_overdue_amount ,t.total_overdue_count
,t.cur_overdue_count ,t.rest_replace_repay_amount ,t.total_replace_repay_count ,t.cur_replace_repay_count ,t.black_handle_note
,t.is_advance_settled ,t.settle_attach ,t.settle_datetime ,t.payment_bank ,t.payment_pdf ,t.deal_enclosure ,t.deposit_receipt ,t.refund_bank_subbranch
,t.refund_bank_real_name ,t.refund_bankcard ,t.second_company_insurance ,t.third_company_insurance ,t.release_apply_note ,t.release_apply_datetime
,t.release_datetime ,t.release_note ,t.release_template_id ,t.judge_receipt_datetime ,t.judge_receipt_amount
,t.judge_receipt_bankcard ,t.judge_receipt_bank_code ,t.judge_note ,t.judge_bill_pdf ,t.settle_pay_datetime
,t.settle_bankcard ,t.settle_pdf ,t.settle_note ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.is_logistics FROM tdh_repay_biz t
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.user_id ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no
,t.bankcard_code ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_code ,t.company_code ,t.biz_price ,t.sf_rate
,t.sf_amount ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount ,t.periods ,t.rest_periods
,t.bank_rate ,t.loan_start_datetime ,t.loan_end_datetime ,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.fx_deposit
,t.first_repay_datetime ,t.first_repay_amount ,t.bill_datetime ,t.month_datetime ,t.month_amount
,t.ly_deposit ,t.cut_ly_deposit ,t.cur_node_code ,t.rest_amount ,t.rest_total_cost
,t.overdue_total_deposit ,t.overdue_total_deposit_income ,t.total_in_deposit ,t.rest_overdue_amount ,t.total_overdue_count
,t.cur_overdue_count ,t.rest_replace_repay_amount ,t.total_replace_repay_count ,t.cur_replace_repay_count ,t.black_handle_note
,t.is_advance_settled ,t.settle_attach ,t.settle_datetime ,t.payment_bank ,t.payment_pdf ,t.deal_enclosure ,t.deposit_receipt ,t.refund_bank_subbranch
,t.refund_bank_real_name ,t.refund_bankcard ,t.second_company_insurance ,t.third_company_insurance ,t.release_apply_note ,t.release_apply_datetime
,t.release_datetime ,t.release_note ,t.release_template_id ,t.judge_receipt_datetime ,t.judge_receipt_amount
,t.judge_receipt_bankcard ,t.judge_receipt_bank_code ,t.judge_note ,t.judge_bill_pdf ,t.settle_pay_datetime
,t.settle_bankcard ,t.settle_pdf ,t.settle_note ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.is_logistics FROM tdh_repay_biz t
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.user_id ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no
,t.bankcard_code ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_code ,t.company_code ,t.biz_price ,t.sf_rate
,t.sf_amount ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount ,t.periods ,t.rest_periods
,t.bank_rate ,t.loan_start_datetime ,t.loan_end_datetime ,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.fx_deposit
,t.first_repay_datetime ,t.first_repay_amount ,t.bill_datetime ,t.month_datetime ,t.month_amount
,t.ly_deposit ,t.cut_ly_deposit ,t.cur_node_code ,t.rest_amount ,t.rest_total_cost
,t.overdue_total_deposit ,t.overdue_total_deposit_income ,t.total_in_deposit ,t.rest_overdue_amount ,t.total_overdue_count
,t.cur_overdue_count ,t.rest_replace_repay_amount ,t.total_replace_repay_count ,t.cur_replace_repay_count ,t.black_handle_note
,t.is_advance_settled ,t.settle_attach ,t.settle_datetime ,t.payment_bank ,t.payment_pdf ,t.deal_enclosure ,t.deposit_receipt ,t.refund_bank_subbranch
,t.refund_bank_real_name ,t.refund_bankcard ,t.second_company_insurance ,t.third_company_insurance ,t.release_apply_note ,t.release_apply_datetime
,t.release_datetime ,t.release_note ,t.release_template_id ,t.judge_receipt_datetime ,t.judge_receipt_amount
,t.judge_receipt_bankcard ,t.judge_receipt_bank_code ,t.judge_note ,t.judge_bill_pdf ,t.settle_pay_datetime
,t.settle_bankcard ,t.settle_pdf ,t.settle_note ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.is_logistics FROM tdh_repay_biz t left join tsys_role_node r on t.cur_node_code = r.node_code
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT distinct code FROM tdh_repay_biz t left join tsys_role_node r on t.cur_node_code = r.node_code ) tb
